segments.text: I've been so stressed these days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's the matter ? Are you OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know where to go for college , and what to major in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . You have plenty of time to decide .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And I also want to get scholarships to help me pay for the tuition . I want to get the burden off my family .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You always worry too much about everything . Take it easy , honey . You are good enough . You can go to the ideal college .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , OK . I'm so sorry . By the way , for you , is it more important to make money or to enjoy your work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In a perfect world , I would enjoy my work if I do not have to do much , and make lots of money !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , honey , stop dreaming . You should face the reality .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's only a joke . To be honest , I have to improve my English , because my English is not good enough . I still get confused about some simple grammars . Since you are quite good at it , do you have any suggestions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: En , first you should be concentrated on what the teacher said in class . Second , I suggest you to take an additional course in some training center .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so . Because I've taken one to improve my oral English during summer vacation .
segments.speaker: S1
